title: The Branches
text: a vertical crack cut across multiple horizontal cracks in the middle of the surface, foretells a journey filled with many paths and possibilities.

title: The Indecisive heart
text: multiple half cracks that don't crack through the whole grain, a decision needs to be made so that the right path shall reveal

title: The Delicate Heart
text: warns of fragility and the need for cau tion and obstacles to be overcome.

title: The Converging/Diverging Paths
text: two lines meet in sharp angle, speaks of unexpected allies and the coming together of forces

title: Curvy lines
text: scattered curvy paths with unclear direction or tendency

title: Hidden Balance
text: two inner cracks that doesn't penetrate towards the surface(), a hidden but fragile balance is achieved at the current moment

title: The Mist
text: no clear sign cracks with uneven surface. The destiny is not set, everything is possible (no cracks/no island/no fault)

title: The Fragile Stem
text: a thin subtle crack that doesnt crack through, warns of a lean season ahead.

title: The Clustered Five
text: tightly packed on a single piece of rice, speaks of a crowded and bustling time to come.

title: The Broken Cloud
text: rough and uneven surface, speaks of challenges and obstacles. (can identify sth but doesn't fill into any category)

title: The Divider
text: a clear horizontal crack the separate the grain into two almost identical halves, an indicator of a clear division that needs to be made

title: The Libra
text: two subtle signs of cracks split by a clear divider crack, showing a struggle between two things

title: The Teller
text: a clear single crack the opens like a telling mouth, unspoken words need to be told and heard, the bigger the opening, the more needs to be shared

title: Mirror
text: Two evenly distributed cracks, as if they are mirroring each other
